actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Breath Attack [Attack | Half damage on a pass] (Recharge Cd4): Take an Action to begin this Attack, which occurs on this Being's next Turn. See [Breath Attack] column below. Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite Bite [Melee Attack]: 11 (2d10) Claw [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8) Tail [Melee Attack 10']: 5 (d10) and shoved Prone 20' away

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Immutable: It can't be transformed. Magic Ward III: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d8 penalty. Terror I: Enemies that can see it for the first time and at the start of their Turns thereafter must pass [Will] or be Frightened (Cd4).
